data.text:
A selected and swapped 
 unit will attack in the 
 direction of its swap.

Kill the king within the 
 number of moves to win 
 the level. The king 
 cannot be swapped.

A special unit will perform 
 a special attack only 
 when it is attacked.

The king can only be 
 killed by a chain of a 
 minimum length.

Use special units to set 
 up a chain.

Select and swap a special 
 unit to change its direction.

Selecting another unit to 
 swap with a special unit 
 will not change the special 
 units direction.
